title: LF Team of 5 for a tourny at Armageddon Hamilton
body:
Hey i am going to be going to Armageddon Hamilton this year and they are having a tournament on, Winners get 100 dollars each, 
Can be any rank, Needs to be physically there, Non toxic, Friendly and looking to have fun :)

I do have 1 other in the team and he will play supp, I main adc, Roles that are open are :
Top

Jungle

Mid

Pm me > HadesUnicorn
Thanks :)

replies.body: Hey ummm add me in game and we will sort it from there thanks
You still looking for people? I main support but I am learning top. Looking to play when possible.

> [{quoted}](name=HadesUnicorn,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=6jA9Gitv,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-11T06:13:53.654+0000)
>
> Hey i am going to be going to Armageddon Hamilton this year and they are having a tournament on, Winners get 100 dollars each, 
> Can be any rank, Needs to be physically there, Non toxic, Friendly and looking to have fun :)

> Thanks :)

Hay I'm going to the expo plat mid laner LFT pretty kick back can play all lanes but top would be my unlucky roll XD easy to get along with I also have a younger brother gold top/ mid laner please get back to us as we are very keen to play :)
